Make Course-Section Designation

Source: R/utilities.R
make.crsesect.Rd

Constructs the course-section designation to match the course-section description in the crsesect_firstday, crsesect_qrtrterm, and crsesect_endterm columns/fields

Usage

make.crsesect(course, sctn_code)

Arguments

course

string containing the course designation; a combination of subj_code and crse_code. For example, "PKG 491".

sctn_code

string (or integer) with the section code.

Value

string with the subject code, course code, and section code to form a course-section designation in the same format as the crsesect_firstday, crsesect_qrtrterm, and crsesect_endterm columns/fields.

Author

Emilio Xavier Esposito emilio.esposito@gmail.com (https://github.com/emilioxavier)

Examples

course <- "PKG 491"
sctn_code <- "6"

make.crsesect(course, sctn_code)
#> [1] "PKG 491-  6"
# "PKG 491-006"
